text:
[Verse]
Morning light it breaks the sky
Coffee steam it climbs so high
People rushing passing by
In this shop I close my eyes

[Chorus]
Coffee shop dreams
Sugar and cream
Life's a little sweeter in a dream
Coffee shop dreams

[Verse 2]
Barista smiles making art
Heart-shaped foam a work of heart
In the corner reading starts
Coffee books and love's restart

[Chorus]
Coffee shop dreams
Sugar and cream
Life's a little sweeter in a dream
Coffee shop dreams

[Bridge]
Whispers hum of life's ballet
Watch the dance don't fade away
Here for now let moments stay
In this coffee shop we play

[Chorus]
Coffee shop dreams
Sugar and cream
Life's a little sweeter in a dream
Coffee shop dreams
title: Coffee Shop Dreams
